metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare offers simpler, more effective threat defense across your workforce, workplace, and workloads with Secure Web Gateway, Zero Trust Network Access, and Browser Isolation all integrated on our Zero Trust platform.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's Threat Protection
relatedBlades.subtitle: Integrated threat defense across network and endpoint security
relatedBlades.copy: Secure across the threat lifecycle with single pane management. Learn how Cloudflare offers a simple, effective approach to threat defense.

subMenuItems.linkText: EMA Report: Availability and Buying Options in the Emerging SASE Market
Omdia Market Radar: Zero Trust Access
Gartner® Hype Cycle™ for Network Security, 2021

relatedBlades.subtitle: Threat protection challenges
relatedBlades.copy1: Internet threats move fast, evading detection.
relatedBlades.copy2: Once an endpoint is infected, malware can spread quickly.
relatedBlades.copy3: Layering security tools from multiple providers can cause latency and poor end-user experience.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare offers instant-on attack protection, with simple but effective defense throughout the threat lifecycle.

relatedBlades.subtitle: Key Features
relatedBlades.copy1: Apply proactive and reactive security controls to protect users and data.
relatedBlades.copy2: No Secure Web Gateway stops 100% of threats. With Zero Trust Browser Isolation, even threats that slip through the cracks can't compromise end-user devices.
relatedBlades.copy3: Simply monitor threat defenses and access controls in one unified solution. Configuration changes propagate in seconds and logging provides visibility across the threat lifecycle.

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare has been there when cyber attacks happen. Not only to help us block attacks, but also to provide the team with useful analytics that we can use to strengthen our security controls."

relatedBlades.title: One Management Interface
relatedBlades.copy: Block or isolate security risks using one easy-to-use management portal. Visibility into users, locations, applications, and more available on the Cloudflare platform with integrations with SSO and SIEM products.

relatedBlades.title: Actionable Threat Intelligence
relatedBlades.copy: Threat hunting with insights from Cloudlare's millions of customers and presence in %{DataCenterCount}+ cities around the world.

relatedBlades.title: Zero Trust Access Control
relatedBlades.copy: Prevent unauthorized access with identity and posture-based rules for application access.

relatedBlades.quote: "IT is evolving by leaps and bounds, and more sophisticated, more destructive cyber threats are emerging every day. Zero Trust is the only viable security model in this environment, and Cloudflare is making it a lot easier for eTeacher Group to get there."

features.title: Solution brief: Zero Trust Integrations
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare supports your threat protection strategy by integrating with the identity providers, endpoint protection platforms, and SIEMs you already use.

features.title: Simpler, more effective threat defense with Cloudflare for Teams

features.title: Demo: Browser Isolation
features.description: This demo shows how Cloudflare's Browser Isolation capability protects users from threats on the Internet without negatively impacting performance.

relatedBlades.title: Helping organizations worldwide progress towards Zero Trust
Start your Zero Trust journey now. With Cloudflare's free plan, your first 50 seats are free.
